definitions.definition: the basic unit of a chemical element.
examples: grain, iota, jot, whit, mite, scrap, shred, ounce, scintilla, trace, smidgen, modicum there wasn't an atom of truth in the allegations

definitions.definition: atoms as a source of nuclear energy.
an extremely small amount of a thing or quality.
examples: I shall not have one atom of strength left
synonyms: modicum "there wasn't an atom of truth in the allegations"
